snippet.title: DeMyth Trailer
snippet.description:
DeMyth is a short puzzle game where you Interact with cute demit girls to find your missing aunt in the Astral Realm.

DeMyth is available on Itch.io!
__________________________________________________________________________________________
This is a quest to find your missing aunt in the Astral Realm.

One day your mother calls to get the report, but you'll get it later and take a nap. Unfortunately, you wake up in the place you aren't supposed to be.

Traverse the Astral Mansion inhabited with local demits (ghosts), ask for helps, find clues, solve puzzles, and fight bosses! To discover the truth behind your aunt! Is she still a human? Or..

Features:
- Traverse the Astral Mansion
- Interact with demits
- Cute demit girls
- Find clues
- Solve puzzles
- Fight boss
- Fight another boss!
- Mystical music!
- Secret ending
- Supported English & Indonesian Language
